title: How to change parts or colors
content:
To change parts numbers or colors code; two ways:
1 -  If you know the part id and/or color code, you can enter them in their respective entry boxes.
2 - You can search for the part id or color code in the tabs located at the right of the application and click on one of them to set them.

title: Changing parts colors.
content:
To change a part color:
If you know the part id, enter it in the entry specific to it.
[Multiple parts can be entered if shift clicked in the parts list or if writen by hand can be specified by seperating them with a coma and a space ', '']
